io.anyline.plugin.barcode

Class BarcodeScanPlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.anyline.plugin.AbstractScanPlugin<BarcodeScanResult>
      • io.anyline.plugin.barcode.BarcodeScanPlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ScanPlugin<BarcodeScanResult>

    public class BarcodeScanPlugin
extends AbstractScanPlugin<BarcodeScanResult>

    Anyline Barcode Plugin

    The Anyline Barcode Plugin scans bar- and qr-codes.

    This plugin is in ALPHA state and may change in a future version.

        public void setBarcodeFormats(BarcodeFormat... formats)

      • setReportingEnabled

        public void setReportingEnabled(boolean isReportingEnabled)
        This has no effect in this plugin. Reporting of results and pictures is always OFF in this plugin.
        Overrides:

        Parameters:
        isReportingEnabled - irrelevant for this plugin
